scenes.description: MC section between Nerissa Ravencroft and Shiori Novella. They interact playfully, perform call and responses with the audience, and discuss the concert's theme.
End screen showing all Hololive English members with text announcing the end of the free preview.

subtitles.original: I got her nose!
subtitles.english: I got her nose!

subtitles.original: No!
subtitles.english: No!

subtitles.original: I can't breathe! Help me!
subtitles.english: I can't breathe! Help me!

subtitles.original: I got your nose!
subtitles.english: I got your nose!

subtitles.original: Give it back!
subtitles.english: Give it back!

subtitles.original: Okay, here you go.
subtitles.english: Okay, here you go.

subtitles.original: Thank you.
subtitles.english: Thank you.

subtitles.original: Well...
subtitles.english: Well...

subtitles.original: We wanted to do some call and responses with you guys, if that's okay.
subtitles.english: We wanted to do some call and responses with you guys, if that's okay.

subtitles.original: So how I like to summon ghosts is by being like really annoying.
subtitles.english: So how I like to summon ghosts is by being like really annoying.

subtitles.original: So I think we should recite the lyrics, right?
subtitles.english: So I think we should recite the lyrics, right?

subtitles.original: Yes!
subtitles.english: Yes!

subtitles.original: So we're gonna say "Fire Fire",
subtitles.english: So we're gonna say "Fire Fire",

subtitles.original: and then right after, you're gonna say "Light the fire", got it everyone?
subtitles.english: and then right after, you're gonna say "Light the fire", got it everyone?

subtitles.original: That's supposed to make ghosts come out.
subtitles.english: That's supposed to make ghosts come out.

subtitles.original: Alright.
subtitles.english: Alright.

subtitles.original: One, two, three.
subtitles.english: One, two, three.

subtitles.original: Fire, fire!
subtitles.english: Fire, fire!

subtitles.original: I don't think that was loud enough. Let's do one more.
subtitles.english: I don't think that was loud enough. Let's do one more.

subtitles.original: Yeah, yeah. Okay, countdown.
subtitles.english: Yeah, yeah. Okay, countdown.

subtitles.original: One, two, three.
subtitles.english: One, two, three.

subtitles.original: Fire, fire!
subtitles.english: Fire, fire!

subtitles.original: That's what I'm talking about!
subtitles.english: That's what I'm talking about!

subtitles.original: I can feel the spirits.
subtitles.english: I can feel the spirits.

subtitles.original: Um, I want to do one more actually, selfishly of me.
subtitles.english: Um, I want to do one more actually, selfishly of me.

subtitles.original: Oh, okay.
subtitles.english: Oh, okay.

subtitles.original: I mean, it's not really a call and response, but I just want the audience for- for me, for myself...
subtitles.english: I mean, it's not really a call and response, but I just want the audience for- for me, for myself...

subtitles.original: ...I just want to hear you all say "Ope". I'm gonna do a countdown.
subtitles.english: ...I just want to hear you all say "Ope". I'm gonna do a countdown.

subtitles.original: Can you all just say "Ope" for me?
subtitles.english: Can you all just say "Ope" for me?

subtitles.original: But- but can you tell us the origin of "Ope"? Like a really quick summary.
subtitles.english: But- but can you tell us the origin of "Ope"? Like a really quick summary.

subtitles.original: "Ope" is just an- an expression, like "Oh", of surprise.
subtitles.english: "Ope" is just an- an expression, like "Oh", of surprise.

subtitles.original: It's like "Oh!"
subtitles.english: It's like "Oh!"

subtitles.original: Yeah, "Ope!"
subtitles.english: Yeah, "Ope!"

subtitles.original: Oh!
subtitles.english: Oh!

subtitles.original: Ope!
subtitles.english: Ope!

subtitles.original: You don't have to sound surprised. You can just say "Ope" though.
subtitles.english: You don't have to sound surprised. You can just say "Ope" though.

subtitles.original: Okay, on three. I won't make you do it twice,
subtitles.english: Okay, on three. I won't make you do it twice,

subtitles.original: so you got one try. Can you get it for me?
subtitles.english: so you got one try. Can you get it for me?

subtitles.original: One shot, okay, okay.
subtitles.english: One shot, okay, okay.

subtitles.original: One, two, three!
subtitles.english: One, two, three!

subtitles.original: Yeah! Heck yeah!
subtitles.english: Yeah! Heck yeah!

subtitles.original: Well, you know, we're here for "Breaking Dimensions".
subtitles.english: Well, you know, we're here for "Breaking Dimensions".

subtitles.original: Yeah. Talk about what- what does "Breaking Dimensions" mean to you?
subtitles.english: Yeah. Talk about what- what does "Breaking Dimensions" mean to you?

subtitles.original: Yes, and we're to be gone!
subtitles.english: Yes, and we're to be gone!

subtitles.original: You okay? Yeah, good. Just keep talking.
subtitles.english: You okay? Yeah, good. Just keep talking.

subtitles.original: Okay, okay. Wow, wow. What- what "Breaking Dimensions" means to me...
subtitles.english: Okay, okay. Wow, wow. What- what "Breaking Dimensions" means to me...

subtitles.original: ...but, uh... I feel like it's a physical achievement because this is our first concert.
subtitles.english: ...but, uh... I feel like it's a physical achievement because this is our first concert.

subtitles.original: Yeah, really. And I kind of feel the same.
subtitles.english: Yeah, really. And I kind of feel the same.

subtitles.original: It's like, I feel like this is solidifying our existence being here, right?
subtitles.english: It's like, I feel like this is solidifying our existence being here, right?

subtitles.original: Yeah.
subtitles.english: Yeah.

subtitles.original: Like, you know, we've been in Hololive for about a year, but now it feels really, really official...
subtitles.english: Like, you know, we've been in Hololive for about a year, but now it feels really, really official...

subtitles.original: ...standing before you, seeing you guys out in the audience, up there, and online too.
subtitles.english: ...standing before you, seeing you guys out in the audience, up there, and online too.

subtitles.original: Yeah. Hi guys.
subtitles.english: Yeah. Hi guys.

subtitles.original: Hey, I'm walking here!
subtitles.english: Hey, I'm walking here!

subtitles.original: Yeah, move it! I'm walking here!
subtitles.english: Yeah, move it! I'm walking here!

subtitles.original: But it's- it's really great to be here because like, it feels- it feels so real, right?
subtitles.english: But it's- it's really great to be here because like, it feels- it feels so real, right?

subtitles.original: Yeah, it really does feel real. It's real!
subtitles.english: Yeah, it really does feel real. It's real!

subtitles.original: You guys, it's like I could touch you.
subtitles.english: You guys, it's like I could touch you.

subtitles.original: The accident wasn't my fault!
subtitles.english: The accident wasn't my fault!

subtitles.original: But I'm so happy to be here with all of Advent, but especially with my...
subtitles.english: But I'm so happy to be here with all of Advent, but especially with my...

subtitles.original: ...beloved Shiori Novella.
subtitles.english: ...beloved Shiori Novella.

subtitles.original: Who's a good girl? Who's my little PogChamp?
subtitles.english: Who's a good girl? Who's my little PogChamp?

subtitles.original: Who's my PogChamp? What's wrong with me?
subtitles.english: Who's my PogChamp? What's wrong with me?

subtitles.original: I don't know, there's a lot.
subtitles.english: I don't know, there's a lot.

subtitles.original: Yeah, I... same, honestly.
subtitles.english: Yeah, I... same, honestly.

subtitles.original: Okay, cool.
subtitles.english: Okay, cool.

subtitles.original: Well, we're having a great time.
subtitles.english: Well, we're having a great time.

subtitles.original: Uh, we do have some potentially maybe bad news...
subtitles.english: Uh, we do have some potentially maybe bad news...

subtitles.original: ...which is if you are at this point of the concert watching online...
subtitles.english: ...which is if you are at this point of the concert watching online...

subtitles.original: ...this is where the free portion of the show ends.
subtitles.english: ...this is where the free portion of the show ends.

subtitles.original: That's right!
subtitles.english: That's right!

subtitles.original: No more sneak-peeking! No more sneaking and no more peeking, in that order.
subtitles.english: No more sneak-peeking! No more sneaking and no more peeking, in that order.

subtitles.original: Yep. So if you're gonna want to watch the rest of the concert and you're online...
subtitles.english: Yep. So if you're gonna want to watch the rest of the concert and you're online...

subtitles.original: ...be sure to head over to SPWN and you can get a ticket and watch the rest of the concert...
subtitles.english: ...be sure to head over to SPWN and you can get a ticket and watch the rest of the concert...

subtitles.original: ...if you want to see uh, my solo performance today, as well as everybody else's amazing performances.
subtitles.english: ...if you want to see uh, my solo performance today, as well as everybody else's amazing performances.

subtitles.original: Yeah! It's gonna be so many wonderful songs.
subtitles.english: Yeah! It's gonna be so many wonderful songs.

subtitles.original: So that's right! Go for purchases, let's go!
subtitles.english: So that's right! Go for purchases, let's go!

subtitles.original: Yeah!
subtitles.english: Yeah!

subtitles.original: But, I... should- should we do the thing?
subtitles.english: But, I... should- should we do the thing?

subtitles.original: Oh, that's right! Yeah.
subtitles.english: Oh, that's right! Yeah.

subtitles.original: Alright, let's fuse. Okay.
subtitles.english: Alright, let's fuse. Okay.

subtitles.original: Everyone, I hope you enjoy...
subtitles.english: Everyone, I hope you enjoy...

subtitles.original: ...Breaking Dimensions!
subtitles.english: ...Breaking Dimensions!

subtitles.original:
The sneak peek part of the show has ended.
Thank you for watching.
subtitles.english:
The sneak peek part of the show has ended.
Thank you for watching.

subtitles.original:
無料パートは終了いたしました！
ご視聴ありがとうございました！
subtitles.english:
